turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: HI how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm fine. I'd like to buy a coffee from Pete's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great which peets did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the pizza on University Avenue and 4th Avenue in San Diego.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what coffe would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like a ice an caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any syrups or add ons? Like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of syrups do you have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sugar-free chocolate sauce, Cinnabon Bun, Vanilla, Sugar-free vanilla, Maple, Hazelnut,

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like some sugar free vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a large iced caramel macchiato, with a shot of sugar free vanilla syrup from the peets on university and 4th in San Diego.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can you add almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Can you read that back to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a large iced caramel macchiato, using almond milk with a shot of sugar free vanilla syrup from the peets on university and 4th in San Diego.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is all set and will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes, the reciept will arrive via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, have a nice time.
